title: The actis and deidis of the illuster and vailzeand campioun, Schir William Wallace, knicht of Ellerslie
author: Henry, the Minstrel, fl. 1470-1492.
publicationStmtPublisher: Be Robert Lekpreuik at the expensis of Henrie Charteris, [and] ar to be sauld in his buith, or the north syde of ye gait abone [sic] the Throne,
